# gaming-solid collection

```html
<atlas-icon 
  [icon]="icon-name"  
  [collection]="'gaming-solid'">
</atlas-icon>

```

export function myFunction(value) {
  console.log('hi there');
  var copyText = `<atlas-icon [icon]="${value}" [collection]="'gaming-solid'" [color]="color" [size]="size"></atlas-icon>`;
  navigator.clipboard.writeText(copyText);
  var tooltip = document.getElementById(`tooltip-${value}`);
  var stringText = copyText.toString();
  tooltip.innerHTML = `copied to clipboard!!`;
}

export function outFunc() {
  var tooltip = document.getElementById("myTooltip");
  tooltip.innerHTML = "click to copy";
}

export function ListItem(array, item) {
  let elementList = (
      <div>
          <span className="tooltiptext" id={`tooltip-${item}`}>click to copy</span>
          <div className="svg-wrapper">
          <svg className="icon">
            <use href={`#${item}`}/>
          </svg>
          </div>
          <p  data-folder="">
          {item}
          </p> 
      </div>
  );
  array.push( <div className="tooltip" key={item}><li key={item} onClick={()=>myFunction(item)}>{elementList}</li></div>)
  return array;   
}

export const Base = () => {
  let iconList = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('gaming-solid'));
  const listOfIcons = [];
  iconList.map(icon=> ListItem(listOfIcons, icon))
  return <ul>{ listOfIcons }</ul>
}
